channel.title: Haskell on Tony Lawrence
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Tony Lawrence

item.title: Configuring your Haskell environment
item.description: My love of functional programming has been getting stronger over the past year so I decided to attend Well-Typed Haskell courses at Skills Matters1. As I’m a huge fan of JetBrains IntelliJ IDE I found using Haskell a little lacking in this area (unless you can be online with FP Complete.) In this article I will explain how I configured my Haskell development environment using Sublime Text 3 and a few extras.
